altername_name: SuperLite 1500 Series: A5: A Ressha de Ikou 5
name: A5: A Ressha de Ikou 5
overview: Take The A Train 5: A5 is a train simulation, urban development and railway company management game, making full use of five different types of transportation. Create your own city. The "optional tours" have evolved from the window mode in A Train 4, you will be able to cruise the city riding in all vehicles that are located on the map. Drive your train through the valley and buildings , view the skyline from air by helicopter at night.
